title: Designing Digital Media Art Visual Effects Using Augmented Reality: Professional Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Usage Experience, Understanding of Fundamental Art/Design Concepts
context.additional_context: Collaborative project for medical/legal/technical professionals to develop task visualization solutions using AR technology

learning_goals: Learners can produce digital media art content using AR development tools (e.g., Unity+Vuforia)
Learners can apply AR spatial composition principles (lighting, perspective, interactivity) to enhance visual impact in practical settings
Learners can create project deliverables integrating 3D modeling and real-time rendering
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
